item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Playable Counter-Strike Diffusion World Model (trained on 2x4090, 5M frames) (128 points | 55 comments)
2. Turn your old laptop into low-end gaming machine (12 points | discuss)
3. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1257 points | 358 comments)
4. WordPress.org's latest move involves taking control of a WP Engine plugin (177 points | 125 comments)
5. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (370 points | 128 comments)
6. Eating less can lead to a longer life: study in mice shows why (36 points | 13 comments)
7. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (99 points | 17 comments)
8. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (76 points | 17 comments)
9. Lessons from Plain Text (36 points | 15 comments)
10. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (178 points | 132 comments)
11. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (138 points | 15 comments)
12. Turkish language has a gossip tense (206 points | 167 comments)
13. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (73 points | 12 comments)
14. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (584 points | 564 comments)
15. FLUX is fast and it's open source (167 points | 75 comments)
16. Pepsi's Soviet Navy (2021) (5 points | 1 comment)
17. The unreasonable effectiveness of plasmid sequencing as a service (12 points | 1 comment)
18. Should we be thinking about luck differently? (5 points | discuss)
19. Wim Taymans: PipeWire Inventor (7 points | discuss)
20. Washington's 'forgotten giant' volcano stirs (49 points | 18 comments)
21. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (779 points | 158 comments)
22. DuckStation (156 points | 53 comments)
23. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (40 points | 26 comments)
24. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (74 points | 34 comments)
25. Hammer Looking for a Nail, AI Drone Looking for Business Case (29 points | 22 comments)
26. The 1/8th Sleep (120 points | 28 comments)
27. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (47 points | 19 comments)
28. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (491 points | 318 comments)
29. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (35 points | 7 comments)
30. Some Notes on Upgrading Hugo (29 points | 13 comments)
